cluster_summaries: This cluster represents a small group of customers who primarily purchase postage and have a low order quantity and price. They are likely businesses or individuals who occasionally need to send out items.

This cluster represents the largest segment of customers and frequently buys chocolate love heart tealights in bulk. They are likely individuals or families who are budget-conscious and purchase items in larger quantities. They value affordable gifts or decorations.

This cluster is characterized by customers who purchase blue harmonica in boxes. They are likely individuals who enjoy music and value quality gifts. They may be interested in unique and interesting items, suggesting a higher-end taste.

This cluster comprises a smaller group of customers who tend to buy blue refectory clocks. They are likely individuals or families looking for decorative items for their homes. They are willing to spend a bit more on quality and design, indicating a preference for unique and stylish pieces.

needs_and_pain_points.pain_points: High shipping costs, limited shipping options

behavioral_data.marketing_suggestions: Targeted email campaigns highlighting shipping rates and discounts, promotions on bulk orders, partnerships with shipping companies

needs_and_pain_points.needs: Affordable gifts, home decor, items for entertaining
needs_and_pain_points.pain_points: Limited budget, lack of time, desire for unique items

behavioral_data.expectations: Good quality for a reasonable price
behavioral_data.marketing_suggestions: Promotional offers, flash sales, loyalty programs, targeted advertising on social media

psychographics.media_consumption: Music streaming services, online music communities

needs_and_pain_points.pain_points: Limited time, desire for unique items, cost of high-quality instruments

behavioral_data.behavioral_drivers: Passion for music, desire for quality
behavioral_data.marketing_suggestions: Partnerships with music schools, targeted ads on music platforms, promotional offers for musicians

psychographics.media_consumption: Home decor magazines, online design communities

needs_and_pain_points.needs: Unique home decor items, functional and stylish pieces
needs_and_pain_points.pain_points: Time constraints, limited budget, desire for unique items

behavioral_data.behavioral_drivers: Passion for home decor, desire for unique pieces
behavioral_data.marketing_suggestions: Targeted ads on home decor websites, collaborations with interior designers, promotional offers for specific styles
